message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CL

The paper proposes a neural message passing approach for augmenting 3D indoor scenes with new objects. This involves predicting a probability distribution over object types that fit well in a given location, based on spatial and structural relationships between objects in the input scene. This task involves computer vision (CV) and graphics (GR) techniques, as well as machine learning (LG) and artificial intelligence (AI) methods for predicting object types and weighting messages through an attention mechanism. Additionally, the paper mentions applications in context-based 3D object recognition and iterative scene generation, which could involve natural language processing (CL) techniques. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper are cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.LG, cs.AI, and cs.CL, in that order.
